channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Mike Lynch's daughter named as second missing Brit after superyacht sinks
item.description: British tech entrepreneur Mike Lynch's 18-year-old daughter Hannah has been named as the second British person missing out of a total of six missing after the superyacht they were on sunk

item.title: Toxic chemicals that can cause brain damage found in antique books
item.description: Scientists have discovered they could be toxic and unsafe to handle.

item.title: Stop strip-searching children especially as Black kids are four times more likely to be targeted
item.description: A shocking 47% of strip-searches of kids result in no further action – children are being humiliated for nothing, says Mirror columnist Darren Lewis

item.title: Pope ‘hiding alien secrets in the Vatican’, UFO campaigner claims
item.description: Extraterrestrial lobbyist Steve Bassett has claimed it is clear the Catholic church knows alien life exists.

item.title: Mike Lynch feared he would die and said goodbye to family before going missing after yacht sank
item.description: British tech tycoon Mike Lynch feared he would die just a month before he went missing - after a yacht he was aboard capsized during a severe storm off the coast of Sicily

item.title: 'I tried viral vodka pasta sauce to see if it was worth the hype – I made crucial mistake'
item.description: Vodka pasta has become a viral sensation over the last few years, with celebrities and influencers alike tucking into the famous dish – so reporter Lucy Marshall put it to the test

item.title: Lostprophets label owner finally breaks silence on paedophile Ian Watkins
item.description: The record label owner who signed Lostprophets has spoken out about disgraced paedophile Ian Watkins and how the allegations of child sex crimes ended his music career
